00016 template <class T>
00017 class MixTexture : public Texture<T> {
00018 public:
00019         // MixTexture Public Methods
00020         MixTexture(Reference<Texture<T> > t1,
00021                            Reference<Texture<T> > t2,
00022                            Reference<Texture<float> > amt) {
00023                 tex1 = t1;
00024                 tex2 = t2;
00025                 amount = amt;
00026         }
00027         T Evaluate(const DifferentialGeometry &dg) const {
00028                 T t1 = tex1->Evaluate(dg), t2 = tex2->Evaluate(dg);
00029                 float amt = amount->Evaluate(dg);
00030                 return (1.f - amt) * t1 + amt * t2;
00031         }
00032 private:
00033         Reference<Texture<T> > tex1, tex2;
00034         Reference<Texture<float> > amount;
00035 };
